tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Faculty (
    faculty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    faculty_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    teaching_schedule TEXT,
    research_interests TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Teaching_Schedule (
    schedule_id INT,
    faculty_id INT,
    course_name VARCHAR(50),
    room_number VARCHAR(10),
    time_of_day TIME
);

CREATE TABLE Faculty (faculty_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, faculty_name VARCHAR(255), department VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE TeachingSchedule (schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, faculty_id UUID, course_name VARCHAR(255), schedule_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE ResearchInterests (interest_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, faculty_id UUID, interest_topic VARCHAR(255))

CREATE TABLE TeachingSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    faculty_id INT,
    course_code VARCHAR(20),
    day_of_week VARCHAR(10),
    time_slot TIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (faculty_id) REFERENCES Faculty(faculty_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FacultyCourses (
    faculty_id INT,
    course_code VARCHAR(20),
    PRIMARY KEY (faculty_id, course_code),
    FOREIGN KEY (faculty_id) REFERENCES Faculty(faculty_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (course_code) REFERENCES Courses(course_code)
);
